children.name: Designed and built interactive data visualizations using D3 and JavaScript, enhancing user experience by creating intuitive, visually engaging dashboards for client decision-making, in diverse industries.
Collaborated closely with clients to tailor UX/UI elements to their branding and functionality requirements, ensuring each visualization met unique user needs.
Dow Jones/The Wall Street Journal | Hogarth WW
Led the development of digital marketing assets using HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and JSON to enhance user interaction and engagement across client sites.
Managed code repositories and documentation with Git, establishing a streamlined Git flow process for efficient collaboration and version control.
Collaborated with design teams to create and edit designs, images, and interactive GIFs, utilizing Adobe Suite and Photoshop, and aligning assets with branding and increasing content engagement.
Developed internal CMS features using JavaScript, Angular, HTML5, and CSS, optimizing content management for internal teams.
Investigated and resolved front-end discrepancies, ensuring a seamless and bug-free user experience across client accounts.
Supported product development and sales engineering efforts by providing technical insights on front-end implementation strategies.
Contributed to UI/UX considerations during strategic planning sessions to improve user engagement and interaction within the product suite.
